General.Name: Talgo S.A.
General.Description: Talgo, S.A. designs, manufactures, and maintains high-speed light rail vehicles worldwide. It offers very high speed, high speed, and intercity trains; and power heads. The company also provides maintenance equipment, including underfloor wheel lathes, measuring equipment, and shunting cars. In addition, it offers maintenance and rolling stock refurbishment services. The company was formerly known as Pegaso Rail International, S.A. Talgo, S.A. was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.
General.Address: Paseo del tren Talgo, 2, Madrid, Spain, 28290
